name: embassy
content:

B1 the group of people who represent their country in a foreign country: at the embassy We used to be friendly with some people who worked at the Swedish Embassy.
B1 the building that these people work in: The Ambassador held a reception at the embassy.
More examplesFewer examplesProtesters staged an anti-war demonstration in front of the US embassy.Soldiers guard the main doors of the embassy.A bomb exploded at the embassy, injuring several people.The embassy compound has been closed to the public because of a bomb threat.Rebel soldiers overran the embassy last night.
